replies.body: Not a lot of info to go on here, but l'll do what I can.  RADS cases are usually due to security settings blocking the game from loading.  Check out our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot as your first step.  If that doesn't help, let me know with more details!
Dude I F*cking love you <3 TY
